page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT IN SUTTON
page.content: In the village of Sutton,a variety of occupations are followed.Some residents are self-employed on their farms and employ workers from the village.Many people living in Sutton have not always lived there but were attracted by the peaceful setting even though they may have to travel some distance to their places of work. Occupations include teachers,chartered surveyor,accountant,university research officer and company director. Places of work are at varying distances from Sutton_some local e.g. Sandy_others further afield such as Milton Keynes and Stevenage whilst a number of Sutton residents travel by train from Biggleswade to London daily.There are a small number of people who are unemployed and several have experienced redundancy in recent years.
